hypothesis: Lower sigma (0.15/0.18) may converge faster and more precisely than baseline (0.15/0.20).

conclusion: FAILED - Baseline sigma (0.15/0.20) is optimal. Both lower (0.15/0.18) and higher (0.18/0.22) sigma perform worse.
key_findings: Baseline sigma 0.15/0.20 is locally optimal in sigma space
